title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: With the crypto market’s downturn, it’s essential to focus on what the blockchain technology industry has always suggested: building. In 2023, the Web3.0 blockchain technology sector will be worth more than six trillion dollars, according to Market Research Future, and Web3.0 will continue to grow at a CAGR of 44.6% from 2023 to 2030.Today AdLunam will discuss the 'Employable Web3 Skillsets' with none other Blockchain Guru AKA Crypto AMMA, Aneesha Reihana, CEO & Co-Founder of Honeycomb Web3.Time: 3 PM CETVenue: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1zqKVPyowPWJBDon't forget to join this interesting session!
